name: Mush Fairy
description:
This is a story more than a game, prepare to read

Controls:

Move: arrow keys

Jump: Z

Interact: X

You can also use a gamepad

(D-pad), (A) and (X) buttons

(only tested xbox controller)

WARNING!
THIS GAME CONTAINS BLOOD, GORE AND STRONG LANGUAGE

Made for The Sweet to Sour Game Jam, March 2023

Credits:

Alec Acosta: Programming

Paulo V: Sprites, Story

Chuck: Music, Sfx
